mean_en: a person whose job is to prepare dead people to be buried and to arrange and manage funerals
word_etyma: mort 死 + ician 表示精于某种学术的人、专家、能手或从事某种职业的人 → n. （美）殡葬业者；丧事承办人
short_phrase: the mortician at the funeral home
sentence: The mortician made the corpse look more lifelike than when he had been alive.
sentence_trans: 这个丧失承办人把尸体弄得看起来比活着时还有生气。
